column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I ordered a personal sized deep dish and a salad for delivery tonight
column2: and probably won't be ordering from here again. The pizza was decent
column3: which is why I gave 3 stars
column4: but the salad dressing was completely spilled in the bag. Not only did it make a mess
column5: but I didn't have any dressing for my salad...
